HDG.IM.content: adding “instead of nothing” prevents beginning directly w/ beings as unquestionably given [?] > forfeit the self-evidence of beings > cannot wholly belong to any thing, not even ourselves ([still] Da-sein “in each case mine”) > in this question, beings come to waver (btwn Being and not-Being), questioning loses secure foothold, Dasein comes into suspense, maintains itself in suspense [what kind of maintenance is this?]

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.IM.linkedContent: adding “instead of nothing” prevents beginning directly w/ beings as unquestionably given [?] > forfeit the self-evidence of beings > cannot wholly belong to any thing, not even ourselves ([still] Da-sein “in each case mine”) > in this question, beings come to waver (btwn Being and not-Being), questioning loses secure foothold, Dasein comes into suspense, maintains itself in suspense [what kind of maintenance is this?]

HDG.IM.content: “we lie in the pincers” > people must transpose itself from center of future happening into originary realm of powers of Being [but you haven’t answered Nietzsche yet!!!] > to ask how does it stand w/ Being? to repeat and retrieve (wieder-holen) inception of our historical-spiritual Dasein (inception begun again more originally) [repetition of origin]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: “we lie in the pincers” > people must transpose itself from center of future happening into originary realm of powers of Being [but you haven’t answered Nietzsche yet!!!] > to ask how does it stand w/ Being? to repeat and retrieve (wieder-holen) inception of our historical-spiritual Dasein (inception begun again more originally) [repetition of origin]

HDG.IM.content: point is to restore historical Dasein of human beings
HDG.IM.linkedContent: point is to restore historical Dasein of human beings

HDG.IM.content: asking of the fundamental metaphysical question is historical: opens up happening of human Dasein in its essential relations > opens to futures to come (Zu-künften), thus binds back to inception > a non-derivative call/summoning of Dasein to its history, call to make a decision

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.IM.linkedContent: asking of the fundamental metaphysical question is historical: opens up happening of human Dasein in its essential relations > opens to futures to come (Zu-künften), thus binds back to inception > a non-derivative call/summoning of Dasein to its history, call to make a decision

HDG.IM.content: German idealism didn’t collapse, age wasn’t great enough to stand up to greatness, breadth, originality of spiritual world, to realize it (more than apply propositions/insights) > Dasein began to lack depth (from which essential comes/returns to human beings), a leveling, no more rank (a blind mirror that no longer mirrors) [w/out rank, can’t stand up to greatness of spirit, but what about the greatness of killing that spirit? (e.g. Nietzsche)]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: German idealism didn’t collapse, age wasn’t great enough to stand up to greatness, breadth, originality of spiritual world, to realize it (more than apply propositions/insights) > Dasein began to lack depth (from which essential comes/returns to human beings), a leveling, no more rank (a blind mirror that no longer mirrors) [w/out rank, can’t stand up to greatness of spirit, but what about the greatness of killing that spirit? (e.g. Nietzsche)]

HDG.IM.content: must not remain indifferent to our Dasein to know Being [proximity] > Being has highest rank [value]: power in which possibility of essence of our Dasein is grounded
HDG.IM.linkedContent: must not remain indifferent to our Dasein to know Being [proximity] > Being has highest rank [value]: power in which possibility of essence of our Dasein is grounded

HDG.IM.content: Being has the meaning we have indicated [?], a definiteness that has long ruled our Dasein [?]: boundary drawn around sense of“Being” stays w/in sphere of “presentness and presence (Gegenwärtigkeit und Anwesenheit), substance and substance (Bestehen und Bestand), staying and coming forth” [?] [facticity of presence?] > our understanding of “to be” drawn to this horizon, and thus fulfilled
HDG.IM.linkedContent: Being has the meaning we have indicated [?], a definiteness that has long ruled our Dasein [?]: boundary drawn around sense of“Being” stays w/in sphere of “presentness and presence (Gegenwärtigkeit und Anwesenheit), substance and substance (Bestehen und Bestand), staying and coming forth” [?] [facticity of presence?] > our understanding of “to be” drawn to this horizon, and thus fulfilled

HDG.WM.content: no annihilation (Vernichtung) of whole of beings takes place in anxiety > nothing doesn’t attract, essentially repelling (abweisend) > nothing itself nihilates (das Nichts selbst nichtet), grants the nothing, not submitted to calculation of annihilation or negation (Verneinung) > nihilation manifests beings in heretofore concealed strangeness as what is radically other (schlechthin Andere) [totally other] re: nothing > originally nihilating nothing brings Dasein, for 1st time, before beings as such—in anxiety original openness of Being

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

motif.name: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"
motif.title: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

HDG.WM.linkedContent: no annihilation (Vernichtung) of whole of beings takes place in anxiety > nothing doesn’t attract, essentially repelling (abweisend) > nothing itself nihilates (das Nichts selbst nichtet), grants the nothing, not submitted to calculation of annihilation or negation (Verneinung) > nihilation manifests beings in heretofore concealed strangeness as what is radically other (schlechthin Andere) [totally other] re: nothing > originally nihilating nothing brings Dasein, for 1st time, before beings as such—in anxiety original openness of Being

HDG.WM.content: originary anxiety usually repressed (niedergehalten), anxiety is there, is sleeping, its breath quivers perpetually through Dasein > daring ones [embrace] anxiety, sustained by that one which they expend themselves > anxiety [?] stands outside of all opposition [anxiety as indifference point?], there’s cheerfulness, gentleness, creative longing
HDG.WM.linkedContent: originary anxiety usually repressed (niedergehalten), anxiety is there, is sleeping, its breath quivers perpetually through Dasein > daring ones [embrace] anxiety, sustained by that one which they expend themselves > anxiety [?] stands outside of all opposition [anxiety as indifference point?], there’s cheerfulness, gentleness, creative longing

HDG.WM.content: going beyond beings occurs in essence of Dasein > this going beyond is metaphysics itself—thus, metaphysics belongs to “nature of the human being” > “because the truth of metaphysics dwells in this abyssal ground [hermeneutic circle of Dasein & metaphysics] it stands in closest proximity to the constantly lurking possibility of deepest error” > [but philosophy was born?] the getting under way of metaphysics, the coming to itself of philosophy, to its explicit tasks

HDG.FS.content: truth in “truth of Being” is understood as “unconcealment,” and, from perspective of Dasein, as clearing
HDG.FS.linkedContent: truth in “truth of Being” is understood as “unconcealment,” and, from perspective of Dasein, as clearing

HDG.FS.content: meaning in “meaning of Being” defined re: project region, projection as accomplishment of Dasein, ek-static instancy in openness of Being: by ek-sisting, Dasein includes meaning > move to “truth of Being” emphasizes openness of Being itself, rather than openness of Dasein re: this openness of Being

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.FS.linkedContent: meaning in “meaning of Being” defined re: project region, projection as accomplishment of Dasein, ek-static instancy in openness of Being: by ek-sisting, Dasein includes meaning > move to “truth of Being” emphasizes openness of Being itself, rather than openness of Dasein re: this openness of Being

HDG.FS.content: how same expression can move from metaphysical to non-metaphysical language: 1) inner illumination (innere Erleuchtung), being itself announces itself (sich bekundet), that Dasein unfolds (ausbildet) ein “Seinsverständnis,” Seinsfrage in Sein und Zeit calls for a renewal (Erneuerung) of language 2) favorable external conditions: a) decline (Verfall) and impoverishment (Verarmung) of language [compare to rich language of brothers Grimm] b) fixing of language in computer calculation stops its natural growth

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.FS.linkedContent: how same expression can move from metaphysical to non-metaphysical language: 1) inner illumination (innere Erleuchtung), being itself announces itself (sich bekundet), that Dasein unfolds (ausbildet) ein “Seinsverständnis,” Seinsfrage in Sein und Zeit calls for a renewal (Erneuerung) of language 2) favorable external conditions: a) decline (Verfall) and impoverishment (Verarmung) of language [compare to rich language of brothers Grimm] b) fixing of language in computer calculation stops its natural growth

HDG.FS.content: nihilating nothing decrees “fall upon beings” [?] > fall (Verfall) not as falling away from (Abfallen von), but as ontological/natural condition of Dasein (Being and Time not leading everyday Dasein to thematization of Being)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: nihilating nothing decrees “fall upon beings” [?] > fall (Verfall) not as falling away from (Abfallen von), but as ontological/natural condition of Dasein (Being and Time not leading everyday Dasein to thematization of Being)

HDG.FS.content: consciousness & Dasein both contain verb “being” (Bewusstsein und Dasein)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: consciousness & Dasein both contain verb “being” (Bewusstsein und Dasein)

HDG.FS.content: when Heidegger looks at inkwell, does so w/out reference to hyletic data and categories, he undergoes fundamental experience w/ thing itself [outside consciousness but still moral image of thought?] > “being” in Da-sein says being-outside-of [vs. being in of consciousness], must preserve an “outside,” thus ek-stasis > Dasein rigorously means: ek-statically being there (immanence is broken) > from ek-stasis to instancy in the clearing (Inständigkeit in der Lichtung) [the turn?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: when Heidegger looks at inkwell, does so w/out reference to hyletic data and categories, he undergoes fundamental experience w/ thing itself [outside consciousness but still moral image of thought?] > “being” in Da-sein says being-outside-of [vs. being in of consciousness], must preserve an “outside,” thus ek-stasis > Dasein rigorously means: ek-statically being there (immanence is broken) > from ek-stasis to instancy in the clearing (Inständigkeit in der Lichtung) [the turn?]

HDG.FS.content: from consciousness to Dasein: revolution of location (Ortschaft) of thinking, and displacement (Ortsverlegung) rather than revolution
HDG.FS.linkedContent: from consciousness to Dasein: revolution of location (Ortschaft) of thinking, and displacement (Ortsverlegung) rather than revolution

HDG.FS.content: to leave (verlassen) region (Bereich) of consciousness and attain (erreichen) that of Dasein: to see that “human only exists (ist) in coming from itself to what is wholly other [ganz anderen] than itself, in coming to the clearing of being”

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.FS.linkedContent: to leave (verlassen) region (Bereich) of consciousness and attain (erreichen) that of Dasein: to see that “human only exists (ist) in coming from itself to what is wholly other [ganz anderen] than itself, in coming to the clearing of being”

HDG.FS.content: surrender consciousness, join new domain (Bereich) of Dasein, must step into it, enter it, to stand in relation to what isn’t man > entry into this domain not produced by thought undertaken by Heidegger: to believe thinking capable of changing place of man, still conceive it (vorstellen) on model of production (Produktion); rather, thinking prepares man for possibility (Möglichkeit) of corresponding to such an entry (Einkehr) [so attention is delayed!]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: surrender consciousness, join new domain (Bereich) of Dasein, must step into it, enter it, to stand in relation to what isn’t man > entry into this domain not produced by thought undertaken by Heidegger: to believe thinking capable of changing place of man, still conceive it (vorstellen) on model of production (Produktion); rather, thinking prepares man for possibility (Möglichkeit) of corresponding to such an entry (Einkehr) [so attention is delayed!]

HDG.OHF.content: [tautological thinking, cf. FS p. 80] “factical” means something of itself articulated (von ihm selbst artikuliert) auf (w/ respect to, on the basis of, and with a view to) so (such) a (factical) character of Being, and “is” in this manner > “life,” a mode of “Being,” thus “factical life”: Dasein there in the manner of being
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [tautological thinking, cf. FS p. 80] “factical” means something of itself articulated (von ihm selbst artikuliert) auf (w/ respect to, on the basis of, and with a view to) so (such) a (factical) character of Being, and “is” in this manner > “life,” a mode of “Being,” thus “factical life”: Dasein there in the manner of being

HDG.OHF.content: for Dasein, having-been-interpreted belongs to its being > hermeneutics has task of making Dasein accessible to to this Dasein itself re: its Seinscharakter, communicating Dasein w/ itself > hermeneutics develops for Dasein a possibility of its becoming/being for itself in manner of understanding itself
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: for Dasein, having-been-interpreted belongs to its being > hermeneutics has task of making Dasein accessible to to this Dasein itself re: its Seinscharakter, communicating Dasein w/ itself > hermeneutics develops for Dasein a possibility of its becoming/being for itself in manner of understanding itself

HDG.OHF.content: hermenutics: wakefulness (Wachsein) of Dasein for itself (not conventional understanding) > interpreting is a being, a distinctive how of character of being of facticity, that belongs to factical life itself (facticity not the object of hermeneutics) > chance that hermeneutics will go wrong belongs to its ownmost being

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: hermenutics: wakefulness (Wachsein) of Dasein for itself (not conventional understanding) > interpreting is a being, a distinctive how of character of being of facticity, that belongs to factical life itself (facticity not the object of hermeneutics) > chance that hermeneutics will go wrong belongs to its ownmost being

HDG.OHF.content: a concept points to a forehaving/foreconception (Vorgriff), transports us to a fundamental experience, calls for a how of addressing (Ansprechens)/interrogating: transports (versetzt) us into the being-there of our Dasein (interpretation & worry [Bekümerung]) > fundamental concepts (Grundbegriffe) not later additions to Dasein, sondern vor-tragen (but carry forward, ex-press), grab/point Dasein in their way [auto-affection?]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: a concept points to a forehaving/foreconception (Vorgriff), transports us to a fundamental experience, calls for a how of addressing (Ansprechens)/interrogating: transports (versetzt) us into the being-there of our Dasein (interpretation & worry [Bekümerung]) > fundamental concepts (Grundbegriffe) not later additions to Dasein, sondern vor-tragen (but carry forward, ex-press), grab/point Dasein in their way [auto-affection?]

HDG.OHF.content: [insidious logic] forehaving of interpretation, that it can’t be present as thematic object clear sign (Anzeichen) of its Seinscharakters, constitutive of interpretation, shares in character of Dasein’s being: Möglichsein (being-possible), modifies itself out of the situation to which the hermeneutic question is operating (Vorhabe not arbitrary/acc. whim)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [insidious logic] forehaving of interpretation, that it can’t be present as thematic object clear sign (Anzeichen) of its Seinscharakters, constitutive of interpretation, shares in character of Dasein’s being: Möglichsein (being-possible), modifies itself out of the situation to which the hermeneutic question is operating (Vorhabe not arbitrary/acc. whim)

HDG.OHF.content: Dasein as the Unterwegs (being-on-the-way) of itself to itself [esoteric/exoteric] > revealed in this kind of being belonging to hermeneutics: the anticipatory leap forward and running in advance (Vorsprung) can/should be undertaken [de facto, de jure] > Vorsprung doesn’t posit (setzen) an end, but gives it free play (freigeben), puts on the way, discloses, holding fast to being-possible
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Dasein as the Unterwegs (being-on-the-way) of itself to itself [esoteric/exoteric] > revealed in this kind of being belonging to hermeneutics: the anticipatory leap forward and running in advance (Vorsprung) can/should be undertaken [de facto, de jure] > Vorsprung doesn’t posit (setzen) an end, but gives it free play (freigeben), puts on the way, discloses, holding fast to being-possible

HDG.OHF.content: interpretation begins in the today (im Heute), average understanding from which philosophy lives and speaks back into > the “every-one (Das Man),” not just fallenness, but a How of factical Dasein

HDG.OHF.content: the hermeneutical Einsatz (engagement/bringing into play), that “with respect to, on the basis of which, and with a view to” all is a card staked (gesetzt) [risk, change, play], the “as what” in which facticity is grasped/stirred, not something that can be fabricated (erfunden), not a readymade possession, arises from a fundamental experience (Grunderfahrung): a philosophical wakefulness (Wachsein), Dasein encounters itself (ihm selbst begegnet)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: the hermeneutical Einsatz (engagement/bringing into play), that “with respect to, on the basis of which, and with a view to” all is a card staked (gesetzt) [risk, change, play], the “as what” in which facticity is grasped/stirred, not something that can be fabricated (erfunden), not a readymade possession, arises from a fundamental experience (Grunderfahrung): a philosophical wakefulness (Wachsein), Dasein encounters itself (ihm selbst begegnet)

HDG.OHF.content: philosophy a mode of knowing in factical life itself, in which factical Dasein ruthlessly dragged back to itself, relentlessly thrown back (zurückreisst) on itself [cf. CPC p. 13]

HDG.OHF.content: in How of its being-now (Jetztseins) works Dasein [MOP?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: in How of its being-now (Jetztseins) works Dasein [MOP?]

HDG.OHF.content: everything modern steals away from its own time (industry, propaganda, creating “effect” only in fashion) > Dasein encounters itself, its Seinscharakter, not a matter for universal humanity or a public, but, in each case (je), definite/decisive possibility of concrete facticity

HDG.OHF.content: covering up of soil from which which definition of human arose: logon exon, animal rationale [rational becomes the logical], Christian Dasein as person capable of knowing, human cut to the measure of faith (glaubensmässig vorbestimmt) as being-created (Geschaffensein) in image of God

motif.name: GOD in DES TOURS DES BABEL
motif.title: GOD in DES TOURS DES BABEL

HDG.OHF.content: defined as Dasein’s own, facticity contains nothing of “ego,” person, “ego-pole,” Aktzentrum ——initial approach (ersten Ansetzen) to “object” of hermeneutical explication must hold fast (halten) to directive (Weisung) co-given in advance in concept of facticity, the possible direction of filling it out (mögliche Erfüllungsrichtung)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: defined as Dasein’s own, facticity contains nothing of “ego,” person, “ego-pole,” Aktzentrum ——initial approach (ersten Ansetzen) to “object” of hermeneutical explication must hold fast (halten) to directive (Weisung) co-given in advance in concept of facticity, the possible direction of filling it out (mögliche Erfüllungsrichtung)

HDG.OHF.content: grasp facticity w/ view to primordiality followed to the end > must be wide awake for specific categories of Dasein, must be brought into view in public manner (having-been-interpreted in the today)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: grasp facticity w/ view to primordiality followed to the end > must be wide awake for specific categories of Dasein, must be brought into view in public manner (having-been-interpreted in the today)

HDG.OHF.content: [existential analytic defines the how of Dasein’s being] [re: temporality of today?] Dasein has its open space of publicness (Öffentlichkeit) and its ways of Seeing (seine Sicht) [there] [cf. 38 summary of today] > moves in definite mode of discourse (Redens) about itself: Gerede (talk) preserves Dasein in averageness > in talk lies guiding “as what” by which Dasein addresses “itself” > talk as the how in which Dasein’s having-been-interpreted (Ausgelegtheit) stands at its disposal > not externally applied to Dasein, something from out of which it lives, is lived, a how of is being

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [existential analytic defines the how of Dasein’s being] [re: temporality of today?] Dasein has its open space of publicness (Öffentlichkeit) and its ways of Seeing (seine Sicht) [there] [cf. 38 summary of today] > moves in definite mode of discourse (Redens) about itself: Gerede (talk) preserves Dasein in averageness > in talk lies guiding “as what” by which Dasein addresses “itself” > talk as the how in which Dasein’s having-been-interpreted (Ausgelegtheit) stands at its disposal > not externally applied to Dasein, something from out of which it lives, is lived, a how of is being

HDG.OHF.content: the way Dasein sees/talks about itself only a mask, so as not to be frightened by itself, warding off (Abwehr) of Angst > Dasein makes itself visible in this masquerade as the height of living (höchste Lebendigkeit) (industriousness [Betriebes])
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: the way Dasein sees/talks about itself only a mask, so as not to be frightened by itself, warding off (Abwehr) of Angst > Dasein makes itself visible in this masquerade as the height of living (höchste Lebendigkeit) (industriousness [Betriebes])

HDG.OHF.content: Dasein: not an object, when, as a distinctive being, it’s there for itself authentically
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Dasein: not an object, when, as a distinctive being, it’s there for itself authentically

HDG.OHF.content: [method warning re: phenomenology] not about obtaining/delivering propositions/dogmas re: Dasein, generating a philosophy around it > rather, a special investigation w/ view to right direction of looking toward genuine phenomenon

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method warning re: phenomenology] not about obtaining/delivering propositions/dogmas re: Dasein, generating a philosophy around it > rather, a special investigation w/ view to right direction of looking toward genuine phenomenon

HDG.OHF.content: two modes of Dasein of today (Dasein im Heute) (discourse about Dasein) [initial givens of today, closest to us? (Zunächst des Heute)] (: 1) historical consciousness 2) philosophy > modes of interpreting, modes of Dasein’s having-itself in a definite manner, must interrogate these modes to interrogate Dasein of today, to subject the today to a destruction > genuine question of hermeneutics: what Seinscharakter of Dasein shows up (zeigt sich) [cf. Sage as showing] in these modes of having-itself (Sichselbstshabens)?

Sage as showing] in these modes of having-itself (Sichselbstshabens)?

HDG.OHF.content: [method] [from] as what is factical Dasein being encountered in historical consciousness & philosophy? [to] what does factical Dasein have itself in these interpretations? [to] what is the having-itself-there of Da-sein as being, as a How of facticity, as an existential?

motif.name: PHILOSOPHY AS AN INSTITUTION  (UNIVERSITY) CIPH, GREPH

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method] [from] as what is factical Dasein being encountered in historical consciousness & philosophy? [to] what does factical Dasein have itself in these interpretations? [to] what is the having-itself-there of Da-sein as being, as a How of facticity, as an existential?

HDG.OHF.content: historical consciousness gives itself task of overviewing “total fact of man (die ganze Tatsache Mensch),” bringing Dasein into view absolutely objectively > in this approach to past, the present of Dasein (Gegenwart des Daseins) is before itself in equally objective manner, & so is the future (not yet [Noch-nicht], just the present when calculated, anticipated by way of comparison): Spengler’s “decline of the West” not cheap witticism or whim, but consequential expression of historical consciousness: its inauthenticity thought through to the end [i.e. if we think of everything in this reductive way, then we have reduced our future]

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: historical consciousness gives itself task of overviewing “total fact of man (die ganze Tatsache Mensch),” bringing Dasein into view absolutely objectively > in this approach to past, the present of Dasein (Gegenwart des Daseins) is before itself in equally objective manner, & so is the future (not yet [Noch-nicht], just the present when calculated, anticipated by way of comparison): Spengler’s “decline of the West” not cheap witticism or whim, but consequential expression of historical consciousness: its inauthenticity thought through to the end [i.e. if we think of everything in this reductive way, then we have reduced our future]

HDG.OHF.content: objective scientific type of philosophy: proper refuge (Schutzwehr) in which Dasein protected from abysmal (bodenlosen) relativism, finds a secure foothold, brings objective possibility of more objective agreement (Übereinstimmung), “All of us…”, i.e. presents Dasein w/ tranquil certainty/security (ruhige Sicherheit) of general/unanimous “yes, I agree” [a force against snarl of worldviews, & rampant skepticism of our day] > when the system is dynamic has character of life itself, simultaneously universal & concrete [not subjective]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: objective scientific type of philosophy: proper refuge (Schutzwehr) in which Dasein protected from abysmal (bodenlosen) relativism, finds a secure foothold, brings objective possibility of more objective agreement (Übereinstimmung), “All of us…”, i.e. presents Dasein w/ tranquil certainty/security (ruhige Sicherheit) of general/unanimous “yes, I agree” [a force against snarl of worldviews, & rampant skepticism of our day] > when the system is dynamic has character of life itself, simultaneously universal & concrete [not subjective]

HDG.OHF.content: [method: Heidegger now tries to show what is there for Dasein in the 2 interpretative modes (philosophy, historical consciousness)] Dasein itself goes toward something, having itself objectively there for itself, bringing itself objectively into its there > historical consciousness & philosophy are modes of Dasein, paths held open (preserved in itself), paths of securing/making certain, paths of falling away > Dasein encounters itself free of standpoints in objective certainty: 1) historical consciousness, Dasein encounters wealth of objective being of its having-been (Gewesenseins) 2) philosophy, Dasein encounters immutability of its always-being-in-such-a-manner (Immersoseins) > both interpretations bring Dasein before its highest & pure present

HDG.OHF.content: [method, Heidegger now explains how the analysis will bring factical Dasein into view, e.g. uncover curiosity in its categorial-ontological character, see Dasein in presence of existentials showing up (herausspringenden)]

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [summary of historical consciousness & philosophy re: how Dasein sees itself]

HDG.OHF.content: forehaving: what is had in advance re: accessing/dealing w/ matter in question > fate of our approach (das Schicksal des Ansatzes) hangs on the primordiality (Ürsprunglichkeit) & genuineness (Echtheit) of the forehaving (in which Dasein as such [factical life] has been placed) [how can you ever assess forehaving unless you simply presume proximity?]

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: forehaving: what is had in advance re: accessing/dealing w/ matter in question > fate of our approach (das Schicksal des Ansatzes) hangs on the primordiality (Ürsprunglichkeit) & genuineness (Echtheit) of the forehaving (in which Dasein as such [factical life] has been placed) [how can you ever assess forehaving unless you simply presume proximity?]

HDG.OHF.content: (formal indication) forehaving of Dasein = being-there of Dasein (factical life) is being in a world > the success of such a demonstration (Ausweisung) doesn’t say anything primordial about forehaving, is only a phenomenon of another forehaving lying further back (already at work in our descriptions) [infinite regress of forehaving, no arrival?] [but Heidegger stresses this being in a world only a formal indication, we must follow its indefiniteness to the right path of looking (rechte Blickbahn), by way of intuition?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: (formal indication) forehaving of Dasein = being-there of Dasein (factical life) is being in a world > the success of such a demonstration (Ausweisung) doesn’t say anything primordial about forehaving, is only a phenomenon of another forehaving lying further back (already at work in our descriptions) [infinite regress of forehaving, no arrival?] [but Heidegger stresses this being in a world only a formal indication, we must follow its indefiniteness to the right path of looking (rechte Blickbahn), by way of intuition?]

HDG.OHF.content: decisive for development (Ausbildung) of a forehaving: seeing Dasein in its everydayness (Alltäglichkeit) > [cf. p. 62] formal indication of forehaving, in average everydayness: factical life means being-in-a-world > what is meant by “world” by “in” by “being”? investigation of each word not piecemeal but one point of view on same unitary phenomenon [demonstrated in intuition?]

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: decisive for development (Ausbildung) of a forehaving: seeing Dasein in its everydayness (Alltäglichkeit) > [cf. p. 62] formal indication of forehaving, in average everydayness: factical life means being-in-a-world > what is meant by “world” by “in” by “being”? investigation of each word not piecemeal but one point of view on same unitary phenomenon [demonstrated in intuition?]

HDG.OHF.content: as-what & How of the world’s being-encountered (Begegnens) lie in significance (Bedeutsamkeit), significance not a category of things but the categorial dimension of being-there > being of world & human life both designated by term Dasein > on basis of factical spatiality we can define ontological meaning of being “in” the environs (Umhaften) of world > “being” that encounters world as Weltdasein, characterized by caring, fundamental mode of being, it “is” its world, the very world it has encountered [hermeneutic circle]

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: as-what & How of the world’s being-encountered (Begegnens) lie in significance (Bedeutsamkeit), significance not a category of things but the categorial dimension of being-there > being of world & human life both designated by term Dasein > on basis of factical spatiality we can define ontological meaning of being “in” the environs (Umhaften) of world > “being” that encounters world as Weltdasein, characterized by caring, fundamental mode of being, it “is” its world, the very world it has encountered [hermeneutic circle]

HDG.OHF.content: Besorgenswege [ways of care]: the beings-which-are-there don’t stand w/in definiteness of definitions, but w/in everydayness & its historicity (Geschichtlichkeit); the there in advance (vorhandene Da) brings the appearance (Vorschein) of “others” into its Dasein > what one-self pursues, that wherein one tarries for a while, one-self (man-selbst) “is” this world: everydayness of Dasein has its Dasein there for itself, seeking it by heeding what others say about it: possibilities of familiarity (of everyday) are factically historical [Mitsein]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Besorgenswege [ways of care]: the beings-which-are-there don’t stand w/in definiteness of definitions, but w/in everydayness & its historicity (Geschichtlichkeit); the there in advance (vorhandene Da) brings the appearance (Vorschein) of “others” into its Dasein > what one-self pursues, that wherein one tarries for a while, one-self (man-selbst) “is” this world: everydayness of Dasein has its Dasein there for itself, seeking it by heeding what others say about it: possibilities of familiarity (of everyday) are factically historical [Mitsein]

HDG.OHF.content: something that is there for us in the being-there of everdayness has forfeited (eingebüsst) authentic character of its there, now lingers in indifference of something we can ascertain > this ascertainability (Festsellbarkeit): not its being, but possibility of its being-an-object > in contrast: disclosedness of what has significance shows the something there in How of its Dasein [Heidegger follows this w/ condensed summary, beginning w/ “From out of…”]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: something that is there for us in the being-there of everdayness has forfeited (eingebüsst) authentic character of its there, now lingers in indifference of something we can ascertain > this ascertainability (Festsellbarkeit): not its being, but possibility of its being-an-object > in contrast: disclosedness of what has significance shows the something there in How of its Dasein [Heidegger follows this w/ condensed summary, beginning w/ “From out of…”]
